actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to amend S. Res. 4 of the 96th Congress, First Session, to provide for the election of Milton R. Young, of the State of North Dakota, to be President pro tempore.

summary.text: Elects Senator Milton R. Young, of North Dakota, as President pro tempore of the Senate for December 5, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to amend S. Res. 4 of the 96th Congress, First Session, to provide for the election of Milton R. Young, of the State of North Dakota, to be President pro tempore.
